markSection

public int[] markSection(java.util.List<TeaserFilterCommon.WordPosition> wpL,
                         int sectionSize)
Mark the section which requires to be taken out for the teaser. This can be used for direct array copy than creating temporary byte arrays.

Parameters:
wpL - Multiple sighted word positions
sectionSize - The length of the teaser section
Returns:
int array. 0th Location = start position, 1st Location = end position
